abstract: The game dominated its competition on Thursday night and held out promise that the Series could make a comeback in the ratings the way the Cardinals did on the field.
snippet: The game dominated its competition on Thursday night and held out promise that the Series could make a comeback in the ratings the way the Cardinals did on the field.
lead_paragraph: One of the most memorable World Series games ever played lifted baseball's biggest attraction to a dominant ratings victory on Thursday night, the first time this match-up was able to crush (almost) all comers.

headline.main: Thrilling Series Game Scores a Ratings Victory
